alert.note: Alert for Jones (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 1:06PM EST until February 04 at 9:09PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Falling Creek near East Juliette affecting Jones County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Falling Creek near East Juliette. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 13 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the woodlands and natural flood plain along the creek in the Piedmont National Wildlife Refuge upstream and downstream from the gage on Round Oak-Juliette Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM EST Friday the stage was 12.8 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 13 feet late this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 13 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
